title: Oil for the 20th century
creator_credit: Jack Howells Productions and Jack Howells
brief_description: Fifty years ago William Knox D’Arcy obtained a concession to search for oil in Persia. This film records his early difficulties and describes the immense oil-producing organisation which has resulted from his enterprise.
description: Fifty years ago William Knox D’Arcy obtained a concession to search for oil in Persia. This film records his early difficulties and describes the immense oil-producing organisation which has resulted from his enterprise.
